With an improvised set-up comprising drums, wind instruments and electronics they play brachial free Jazz/ Noise improvs at everyday venues badly in need of some culture ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ such as pedestrian zones in Munich, in front of a miners audience in the Ruhr District, or in the countryside under the stars. This is not an .avi - it is a folder containing the VTS files etc. Subtitles are an optional track that can be clicked on and off with remote control.

This is also the first time I have uploaded anything so i apologize for any glitches.
